title: Philip Chapman - The Golden Age CDRip [FLAC]
description:
A magical and peaceful album of outstanding beauty. This music is full of colour and luminosity ; a compelling mix of dreamy orchestral music that generates a warm and harmonious mood, together with a fresh, poetic, lyrical quality that is remarkably expressive and pleasurable. Philip Chapman's music always celebrates our potential for feeling of joy and a relaxed serenity, and one certainly emerges from this music with a sense of optimism and a calm delight.

1 The Rainbow Dawn 20:23
2 Planetary Renaissance 19:27
